original_title: Ma Compil' - 12 histoires féériques de Noël
overview: That is there, it is soon Christmas! Your preferred heroes are very excited with the idea to decorate the fir tree and to play in snow. And the come night… It would be said that made somebody of the noise in the chimney. It is magic! The next morning, the gifts are at the bottom of fir tree. Merry Christmas with all!
title: Ma Compil' - 12 histoires féériques de Noël
